      Parameters:
      z - rotate over the clockwise over the center of the device
      x - rotate over the X asis ( - )
      y - rotate over the Y axis ( | )

    • turnOnWiFi

      public void turnOnWiFi()
      Since Android Q, a method to change the WiFi service state has been restricted. #12327 Please toggle the state via UI instead of this method. The UI flow depends on devices. Please make sure to encode the correct UI flow on your target device under test.
